ygData.subject: Re: Hunting grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, in my journey to Guk and when i managed to kill the giant heart spider, i was level 12 with my cleric and was with 5 other level 15 chars...so it would
ygData.messageBody:
Well, in my journey to Guk and when i managed to kill the giant heart
spider, i was level 12 with my cleric and was with 5 other level 15
chars...so it would be a really big risk for you to try with out 2 more in
your party, they range from level 18-21 i think...they poison as well and
its a nasty dose of venom...so be sure to have soem form of healer with you.

Dont forget you wont be figting the Giant heart spder alone...itll be with
one more small heart spiider and in the adjacent rooms there are 7 more
spiders, dont worry they are too far away to swarm, just dont try to
run....make sure you can take out the giant first. Oh, the spiders dont
Attack on sight either...but will if you are low in Hp as will most
creatures.
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Hunting grounds
>
> From: Sean.Clark@...
>
> What level are the Giant Heart Spiders? Can a group or 4 lvl 15
> characters
> take one out?
> Thanks in advance for the info!
> Sean
>

> amazing loot from the giant heart spider( the chitin shell sheild...best
> sheild i have seen thus far.)
> John Zwanenburg

> > and was wondering a nice place to go for
> > experience and loot. Blackburrow and Paw are
> > a little below our level except for the few spawns
> > of Commanders, Captains, and the Rex brothers
> > but the trains associated with these dungeons
> > and the amount of people camping in them are
> > a huge deterrant. We have been thinking about
> > tackling the minotaurs in the Beholder Maze or
> > maybe even a trip down to Upper Guk. Any
> > advice would be greatly appreciated.
> >
> > Angarth, Warrior of the Wolf, 15 Tier
